title: Weird kerning with MS Sans Serif
content:
I'm total noob when it comes to fonts but my eyes hurt every time I look on MS Sans Serif. My issue is with spacing/kerning before "lower case i with acute" letter - there's just too much space. See attached sample (MS Sans Serif, 8 px). Is something like that normal/tolerable or is this a bug?
